title: Setting up Pixel 3, transfer cable issue
content:
Connected new Pixel 3 to my old Galaxy s7 using the cable as per the setup instructions. When I started the data copying both phones had plenty of battery life, but after nearly an hour (yep, taking its time) I noticed the Galaxy now has 82% battery (started at 65%) and the Pixel is looking really low (can't see a percentage as I don't want to interrupt it).

Is this normal?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
